Wairarapa boy racer incident: Violent attack sparked after driver’s car hit spectator, says bystander https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wairapa-boy-racer-incident-violent-attack-sparked-after-drivers-car-hit-spectator-says-bystander/PI2P52XP6JDZNCH7JMQESK4HDQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wairapa-boy-racer-incident-violent-attack-sparked-after-drivers-car-hit-spectator-says-bystander/PI2P52XP6JDZNCH7JMQESK4HDQ/ Katie OliverThe man said it's a select few who ruin boy racing events for everyone else. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 07:19:04 +0000 The driver of this silver car was assaulted and the vehicle smashed up when a boy racer event in Masterton last night turned violent. Photo / Supplied
Immigration NZ assessing far-right conspiracy theorist Candace Owens’ application after Australia cancels visa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/immigration-nz-assessing-far-right-conspiracy-theorist-candace-owens-application-after-australia-cancels-visa/LVWAHMFY3FER7EOCU3KOIVSQIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/immigration-nz-assessing-far-right-conspiracy-theorist-candace-owens-application-after-australia-cancels-visa/LVWAHMFY3FER7EOCU3KOIVSQIE/ David Williams'She seems to have an unhealthy preoccupation with Jews.' Sun, 27 Oct 2024 06:48:13 +0000 Immigration New Zealand has confirmed it is assessing the visa application for Candance Owens after her entry to Australia was blocked.
An end to fiscal holes – National, Labour and Greens push ahead with costings offices https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/an-end-to-fiscal-holes-national-labour-and-greens-push-ahead-with-costings-offices/GBXUGZHSGBE6TGDTLYH5TLHBXE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/an-end-to-fiscal-holes-national-labour-and-greens-push-ahead-with-costings-offices/GBXUGZHSGBE6TGDTLYH5TLHBXE/ Thomas CoughlanPoking holes in opposing parties’ costings has long been a feature of NZ elections. Photo / Mark Mitchell

Semisie Pomale avoids conviction, three years after Auckland MMA fighter Fau Vake’s ‘coward punch’ death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/semisie-pomale-avoids-conviction-third-years-after-auckland-mma-fighter-fau-vakes-coward-punch-death/CFKXXNUENRDLRAVG6QL4R6EU64/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/semisie-pomale-avoids-conviction-third-years-after-auckland-mma-fighter-fau-vakes-coward-punch-death/CFKXXNUENRDLRAVG6QL4R6EU64/ Craig KapitanSemisie Pomale was granted a discharge without conviction, in part because of his new job. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 05:27:52 +0000 Semisie Pomale, one of four men who participated in an Auckland Central scuffle that resulted in the death of MMA fighter Fau Vake, leaves Auckland District Court in June 2021. He's pleaded guilty to common assault. Photo / Dean Purcell
Labour MP Ginny Andersen apologises after resharing King Charles, Christopher Luxon quip on Instagram https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/labour-mp-ginny-andersen-reshares-king-charles-christopher-luxon-quip-on-instagram/JJODWEBI6RABFF65SXSTU3GZLE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/labour-mp-ginny-andersen-reshares-king-charles-christopher-luxon-quip-on-instagram/JJODWEBI6RABFF65SXSTU3GZLE/ Tom Rose"I shouldn't have shared it. I regret doing so and apologise for any offence caused." Sun, 27 Oct 2024 04:34:25 +0000 Labour MP Ginny Andersen reshared a post which made an explicit reference with regard to an outfit King Charles wore at the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Samoa. Photos / Mark Mitchell, @christopherluxon

Photo / S Curtis
